Title: Essential New Wave
Description: One of the most eclectic sub-genres in rock music that defined pop music in the early 1980s.
Artists on this station: The Cars, A Flock Of Seagulls, Cyndi Lauper, Culture Club, Eurythmics, Men at Work, The Go-Go's, The Cure, Thompson Twins, Talking Heads, Duran Duran, Jack Hues, Wang Chung, Depeche Mode, ABC, The Knack,
